name: Samurai Squirrel
description:
Made by Ducky Boi Games Black (IG:@weebslash)

Samurai Squirrel is a 2D roguelike action game where you have, to advance through a dungeon, defeat enemies, get powerups, and defeat your nemesis for once and for all.

*Use your mouse to aim.

*Click to attack. Yes. With the giant katana in your hand.

*If you hit BLUE bullets, you can parry them back!

*If you hit GRAY bullets, they get erased from the time-space continuum!

*Don't even try to hit red bullets, you can get in legal trouble for that...

*Hold LEFT SHIFT or RIGHT CLICK to run.

*Interact with E.

*Press Q to use a SMOKE BOMB that will destroy all the bullets flying around! You only have a limited amount, so use them wisely...

Every game generates a totally new dungeon randomly.

 Advance through the dungeon, collect items, and seek to defeat the terrible boss awaiting in his room.

Samurai Squirrel was made by Ducky Boi Games Black, a small universitary team located in Alicante, Spain.

Developed in C++ using SFML libraries. Tinyxml and Tiled  used for the tilemaps.

You are free to mod and toy around with the game files however you like. If so, let us know! IG: @weebslash

Developers: @ennioxfire @mtnzisreal @gpcaballero @danny3vans @mikiteruel
